Name: Pattern Recognition - PE

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE

So each row in Order Lines would generate an event with Activity "Item Picked", timestamp from item_picking_date, and the resource is the picker_id (name from resources).

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Each delivery has a dispatch and arrival date. So each delivery record... would need two events: "Order Dispatched" with the dispatch date, and "Order Arrived" with the arrival date.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND

Name: Validation - PE

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Each invoice is an event "Invoice Issued" with the invoice_issue_date, and the billing_person_id as the resource (from Resources). The billing person's name would come from the Resources Table. Each invoice is a separate event...

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now, putting this all together. For each order, we start with the Order Created event. Then for each item in the Order Lines, an Item Picked event. Then for each delivery, two events (Dispatched and Arrived). Then each invoice, and each payment... Now, I need to ensure that all events are in chronological order for each order.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
